nodes.bodyText:
should we do this in getAuthorizationRequest() above? (adding claims as part of the AuthorizationRequest object through its builder, then use those values to construct TokenRequest in strategy.createTokenRequest()).
Lengthier solution, but I think it fits with the pattern we have here better.
Actually... I just noticed that we already set the claims over there (line 154). Therefore the bug should be in strategy.createTokenRequest(s).
